summary: When a mentally disturbed young man tells a pretty girl that he's a secret agent, she believes him, and murder and mayhem ensue.
cast: Anthony Perkins|Tuesday Weld|Beverly Garland|John Randolph|Dick O'Neill|Clarice Blackburn|Joseph Bova|Ken Kercheval|Don Fellows|George Ryan's Winslow High-Steppers|Jay Barney|Timothy Callahan|Parker Fennelly|William Fort|Tom Gorman|Paul Larson|Dan Morgan|Maurice Ottinger|Gil Rogers|George Ryan|Bill Sorrells|Ed Wagner
title: Un maravilloso veneno
